reviewText: Not the best in the world, writing style can be a tad repetitive from page to page like the way a tv show might repeat scenes after a commercial ends.BUT, so far it is an informative overview of data science and big data.Totally enjoyable read if you are not versed in the topic.Not a book for those who already work in this field or are already doing Hadoop and R in the same breath.
title: A Simple Introduction to DATA SCIENCE
